# outputFileType

**Instance Property**

A uniform type identifier (UTI) that indicates the type of file to write.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputFileType: AVFileType { get }
```

## Configuring output settings

- **audioSettings**: An audio settings dictionary.
- **sourceAudioFormat**: The format of the source audio data.
- **videoSettings**: A video settings dictionary.
- **sourceVideoFormat**: The format of the source video data.
- **sourceVideoMinFrameDuration**: A time value that describes the minimum frame duration of the video data.
- **sourceVideoAverageFrameDuration**: A time value that describes the average frame duration of the video data.

items.description: The format of the source audio data.
items.name: sourceAudioFormat

items.description: The format of the source video data.

items.description: A time value that describes the minimum frame duration of the video data.
